Written by Norman Lewis, Word Power Made Easy was published in 15 February 1991 by Pocket Books. It is a quick guide to increase your mastery in English. This book helps us understand English and learn English. It teaches us how to read quickly and how we can understand what we read. Speaking confidently is what all of us desire and this book helps us achieve it.

The book serves as a vocabulary builder and helps people, especially beginners, to learn to read, write and understand English. Exercises designed to develop vocabulary skills present words together with their pronunciations, definitions and different uses in sentences.

English is not easy to pick up especially if you are not a native English speaker. Hence this book is very handy if you want to stop making embarrassing mistakes in English. It gives you a wider and deeper knowledge of English and teaches you practical English. The exercises help in making the learning easy. Remembering is the tricky part, but in this book the language is made simple so that you can read, learn and remember things easily.

Norman Lewis is a grammarian who is well versed in the English language. Understanding the difficulties of learning the language, he wrote this book to help people love and are willing to learn the English language. This book is available in paperback.

Key Features

    It is simple and handy and is a step by step workbook.
    This book gained a lot of attention as it is easy to understand and comprehend.
